title: Fs: T206 HOF Portraits (Joss, Waddell, E. Collins x 2, Marquard)
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: Fs: T206 HOF Portraits (Joss, Waddell, E. Collins x 2, Marquard)
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone.

I have some attractive T206 available for anyone who is interested. For imagery and pricing please email me at t206society@gmail.com and I will be back with you as soon as possible.

I am happy to work with you folks. Thank you very much for your time and interest. 

Derek


HOF

Christy Mathewson portrait PSA 2  SOLD
Joe Tinker portrait PSA 3  SOLD
Mordecai Brown portrait PSA 4  SOLD
Ed Walsh PSA 3  SOLD
Chief Bender portrait PSA 3.5  SOLD
John McGraw glove at hip SGC 4  SOLD

SL/ Commons etc.

Ed Foster (Old Mill) SGC 4  SOLD
Fred Tenney PSA 6  SOLD

Hi everyone. I have some nice looking T206 available including some new selections.

If you would like to see imagery and pricing please contact me at t206society@gmail.com or simply click the following link: [url]http://t206society.com/product-tag/for-sale/[/url]

Further, I am currently offering a special for anyone who is interested - Should you wish to acquire a card from this list you have the option of adding a copy of the new second edition of the "T206 Collection - The Players & Their Stories"  book for a discounted rate of $30 delivered to your order:  [url]http://t206society.com/product/the-t206-collection-the-players-their-stories-by-tom-ellen-zappala/[/url]

Thank you very much. I am happy to work with people and please feel free to contact me with any questions.

Derek


HOF

Cy Young portrait PSA 2.5  SOLD
Mordecai Brown portrait (Sovereign 350) PSA 4  SOLD
Nap Lajoie portrait PSA 2  SOLD
Fred Clarke batting SGC 4  SOLD
Bobby Wallace SGC 4  SOLD
John McGraw portrait with cap SGC 3  SOLD
Roger Bresnahan bat PSA 1  SOLD

Commons/ Bad Boys

Hal Chase black cap (Sovereign 460) PSA 2 MC  SOLD

Still searching for that Home Run gift for Mother's Day but you just keep striking out? Look no further! ;)

But seriously ... I do have a small crop of T206 available for anyone interested. Nothing of the earth shattering variety but some solid HOF including some portraits.

Further, we are very grateful to announce that we recently won the 2019 IBPA Benjamin Franklin Gold Medal in the category of Sports & Recreation for the second edition of the T206 Collection - The Players & Their Stories book, featuring new imagery and two additional chapters. For anyone interested, we offer the book at a special rate of $30 including shipping if you are purchasing a card as well.

Pricing and imagery can be found at this link:  [url]http://t206society.com/product-tag/for-sale/[/url]

If anyone is interested please feel free to contact me at t206society@gmail.com

Thank you very much.

Derek

Hello everyone. I have a small batch of some nice looking T206 HOF portraits available for anyone who is interest. Please feel free to email me and I will be happy to assist you ...  t206society@gmail.com

Thank you!

Derek
